pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD.
129 DODSON STREET HAMILTON, ON
PROJECT: FLOATING SLAB
CLIENT: ROB LACHAPELLE
DRAWING TITLE: NOTES, PLAN & SECTION(S)
SHEET NO.: S1
PROJECT NO.: 25-01-028
DATE: 2025-05-08
SCALE: AS NOTED
DRAWN BY: CC
REV BY: CC
DATE: 2025-05-08
DESCRIPTION: ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES:
FOUNDATIONS:
1. REMOVE ALL TOPSOIL AND ORGANIC MATERIAL FROM THE BUILDING AREA.
2. SLAB MUST BE CARRIED DOWN TO NATURAL UNDISTURBED SOIL CAPABLE OF SUSTAINING 1500 PSF (75 kPa) ALLOWABLE BEARING PRESSURE OR 2500 PSF (120 kPa) IF OTHER STRUCTURES UTILIZE SIMILAR BEARING PRESSURE.
3. IF FILL IS TO BE BUILT UP, GRANULAR FILL IS TO BE USED AND COMPACTED IN MAXIMUM 6" LIFTS. FILL IS ON GRADE TO BE INSPECTED BY GEOTECHNICAL ENGINEER.
4. ENGINEER SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR UNANTICIPATED DIFFERENTIAL FOUNDATION MOVEMENT RESULTING FROM ADVERSE FROST ACTION.
5. SLAB ON GRADE HEATING: IF NOT INSTALLED, CLIENT/CONTRACTOR ACCEPTS THE POTENTIAL OF CRACKING/HEAVING OVER TIME (IF BUILDING IS NOT HEATED) OR HEAT LOSS (IF BUILDING IS HEATED).
6. ENGINEER SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE IF CLIENT/CONTRACTOR ACCEPTS THE POTENTIAL OF CRACKING.
7. SLAB IS ON STRUCTURAL FILL. ENGINEER MAY BE USED TO MAXIMUM 4" OF AGG ABOVE SLAB.
8. CLIENT/CONTRACTOR TO CONFIRM SLAB DIMENSIONS BEFORE ORDERING MATERIAL & STARTING CONSTRUCTION.
CONCRETE:
1. ALL CONCRETE ON THIS PROJECT SHALL HAVE A MINIMUM OF 20 MPa COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH AT 28 DAYS WITH A MAXIMUM 0.45 WATER/CEMENT RATIO.
2. REINFORCEMENT SHALL BE GRADE 400.
3. WELDED WIRE MESH SHALL BE 6x6/6x6.
4. ALL REBAR SHALL BE 15M, TYP.
5. CONCRETE WORK SHALL BE CARRIED OUT IN ACCORDANCE TO THE LATEST EDITION OF CSA A23.1 AND A23.2 AND LOCAL BY-LAWS.
6. SLAB ON GRADE SHALL BE MINIMUM 4" THICK.
7. SLAB SHALL BE POURED IN ONE CONTINUOUS POUR.
8. CURE CONCRETE TO MAINTAIN A CONSTANT TEMPERATURE.
9. SAW CUT SLAB TO A DEPTH OF SLAB THICKNESS (1"), SPACE SAW CUTS @ 15' o.c.
10. SLAB IS TO BE POURED ON FROZEN GROUND.
11. SLAB IS TO BE POURED MONOLITHICALLY IN ONE TIME.
12. SLIP JOINTS RECOMMENDED FOR ALL UTILITY CONNECTIONS.
REVIEW OF FLOATING SLABS:
IF REVIEW & SIGN-OFF OF THE FLOATING SLAB IS REQUIRED, PROVIDE PHOTOS OF THE FOLLOWING ITEMS TO WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. (WE) FOR REVIEW BEFORE CONCRETE IS POURED:
- EXCAVATION
- FORMWORK (INCLUDING A TA...
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides a detailed overview of the floating slab foundation design, including a plan and section view. It includes general notes on foundation preparation, concrete specifications, and construction requirements. The drawing specifies the dimensions and reinforcement details for the slab, as well as guidelines for installation and inspection. The sheet is essential for ensuring proper foundation construction and includes critical notes on potential issues such as cracking and heating requirements.
